map.name: Mame, I Shrunk the PvPers
map.objective: Capture both of the enemy's wools, and buy upgrades from the villagers to help you do so!

contributor.contribution: Let me use this memey name

broadcasts.alert: Buy upgrades with Gold Nuggets, earned from kills, mining, and the middle spawners!
broadcasts.tip: Buy upgrades with Gold Nuggets, earned from kills, mining, and the middle spawners!

message.text: `bYour sword has been upgraded to `4`lSharpness I`r`b!
`bYour armour has been upgraded to `9`lProtection I`r`b!
`bYour team's base now has a `7`lMining Fatigue Trap`r`b!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `7`lChainmail`r`b!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `f`lIron`r`b!
`bYour team's kit has been upgraded to `b`lDiamond`r`b!

apply.message: You may not break or place around the spawner!
You may not break the ender chest!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter the opponent's spawn!
You may not enter your own wool room!
You may not enter your own wool room!
You may not interact with this block!
You may not interact with this block!
You may not build in the void area!
You may not modify the spawns!

item.name: `7`lChainmail Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has chainmail leggings and boots

item.name: `f`lIron Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has iron leggings, boots, and sword

item.name: `b`lDiamond Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has diamond leggings and boots

item.name: `7`lChainmail Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has chainmail leggings and boots

item.name: `f`lIron Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has iron leggings, boots, and sword

item.name: `b`lDiamond Kit
item.lore: `7Your team's spawn kit now|`7has diamond leggings and boots

item.name: `4`lSharpness I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Sharpness I on all swords

item.name: `e`lProtection I
item.lore: `7Your team permanently gains|`7Protection I on all armor pieces.

item.name: `6`lHaste I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste I!.

item.name: `6`lHaste II
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Haste II!.

item.name: `c`lSpeed I
item.lore: `7All players on your team|`7permanently gain Speed I!.

item.name: `7`lMining Fatigue Trap
item.lore: `7Enemies who enter your side will|`7receive Mining Fatigue I.
